### Example: Simple Matplotlib Plotting

Take $x \in [0,60]$ and $y = 2\sin{x}$

```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = np.arange(60)
y = 2 * np.sin(x)

plt.ylabel(r'$y = 2\sin{x}$')
plt.xlabel(r'$x$')
plt.plot(x,y)
```
